settings.subtitle: Quickly find out if we've already addressed your query.

settings.title: What are my payment options?
settings.accordion_content: We have numerous payment methods that our customers can choose from namely: Credit Cards (Visa and MasterCard), Cash on Delivery (COD), PayPal, and GCash. Just select your preferred payment method upon checkout.

settings.title: How do you take OSwell food supplements?
settings.accordion_content: As a dietary supplement, we suggest our customers take 2 tablets a day. For quicker and enhanced effect, take up to 4 tablets a day. Products should be taken preferably with a meal, or as directed by a qualified healthcare practitioner. Follow instruction. Ingest in moderation.

settings.title: Can OSwell food supplements be used by pregnant or breastfeeding women?
settings.accordion_content: Yes, it is safe for consumption. However, pregnant and breastfeeding women have different dietary requirements and as such, it is recommended to consult your doctor before taking any food supplements.

settings.title: Can a child take OSwell food supplements?
settings.accordion_content: For adults use only. Not intended for children. We always recommended consulting with your physician prior to use.

settings.title: Can you take this while using other medications?
settings.accordion_content: Yes, as long as you take it at least 2 hours after taking your medications.

settings.title: Are there any side-effects?
settings.accordion_content: OSwell’s food supplements are made of all natural ingredients. The extensive research on the ingredients and final products have shown NO significant side effects.

settings.title: Is it safe to take?
settings.accordion_content: Yes, OSwell food supplements are all FDA registered. Furthermore, our processes and factories are all ISO and HACCP approved. It is safe to take.

settings.title: How many days to process the order?
settings.accordion_content:
Metro-Manila - 1~2 days

Luzon - 2~3 days

Visayas - 7~10 days

Mindanao - 7~10 days

Islands - 7~10 days

Palawan - 3~4 weeks
